reviewText: It was good except there is one part that is not appropriate for a corporate environment, so if you use this in a company setting, you will want to review it first and stop the video prior to that section (you will see once you review it prior to showing it).
This is a great talk on public soeaking and making effective presentations. I actually show it to all my university students. Sjodin is thorough, experienced, knowledgeable, and incredibly funny.
A must presentation if you manage sales.
This is one of the most dreadful material I have ever come across. I would like to sell it second hand but I doubt that anyone would even pay a penny!
My team enjoyed this. What was beneficial were the quirky examples.  It felt a little long but overall a good item to have in ones library of training material.

Terri manages to keep the viewers' attention and interest alive during the entire presentation. She speaks very well, and communicates very effectively to the audience.

Highly reccommend this to anyone involved in trying to get a point across, whether in sales or not.
